title: TRASH TALK
subtitle: Design & Development
desc: I created this site to be a social media hub for reality TV lovers. Trash Talk allows users to select shows, seasons, and episodes to engage in spoiler-free conversations with fellow fans,  perfect for those catching up on their favorite shows. Discuss plot twists, characters, and more in a dedicated space tailored for every episode. The site is currently still in development.
